items.sentence: Tom is the one who took care of my dog while I was in Boston.
Tom wants to grow a beard, but his wife doesn\'t want him to.
Tom has been driving without a license since he was thirteen.
I don\'t think Tom and Mary are going to be happy about that.
Tom saw Mary walk in and take a seat in the back of the room.
Tom and Mary seem to be having trouble making up their minds.
Why am I always the one who has to do everything around here?
Tom doesn\'t know who Mary thought was going to win the race.
Tom doesn\'t seem particularly interested in learning French.
Have you had a thorough medical checkup within the last year?
